name: No Time to Relax
description: No Time to Relax is a life simulation game where up to 4 players online or locally compete against each other in the ultimate game of life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 1.5GHZ + Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Intel HD 4000 / GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
